ISSUE.TITLE: Support for searching the tables
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature request When there are 100s of tables it's harder to scroll and find out the tables. It would be great if there is a search bar on top which filters the table.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: load tables list in alphabetic order re #737 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat(gui): add table list filter option re #783 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
